subtasks.content: Add 'queued' to TaskStatus type in src/types/index.ts
Add new Task fields: branch (string), branchStatus (BranchStatus), baseBranch (string), createdAt (string) in src/types/index.ts
Create BranchStatus type: 'created' | 'ahead' | 'behind' | 'conflicts' | 'merged' in src/types/index.ts
Update CreateTaskInput interface to include optional baseBranch field
Create src/server/services/git.ts with getCurrentBranch() function using child_process
Implement createBranch(branchName, baseBranch) function in git.ts
Implement checkoutBranch(branchName) function in git.ts
Implement getBranchStatus(branchName) function - returns ahead/behind/conflicts status
Implement hasUncommittedChanges() function in git.ts
Implement branchExists(branchName) function in git.ts
Create src/server/services/queueProcessor.ts with getQueuedTasks() function sorted by priority then createdAt
Implement getRunningTasksCount() in queueProcessor.ts for concurrency control
Implement processQueue() main loop that checks concurrency and starts next task
Implement startQueuedTask(task) - creates branch and triggers workflow execution
Add MAX_CONCURRENT_TASKS environment variable support (default: 1)
Add queue processor startup with setInterval in src/server/index.ts
Update workflow.ts to checkout task branch before execution starts
Update workflow.ts to set task.branch field when workflow starts
Update workflow.ts to update branchStatus after workflow completion
Update store.ts to persist branch, branchStatus, baseBranch, createdAt fields
Add POST /api/tasks/:id/conflict-task endpoint to create conflict resolution task
Update task creation to auto-populate createdAt timestamp
Add QUEUED column HTML structure in src/client/index.html (between TODO and RUNNING)
Add CSS styles for QUEUED column with distinct visual appearance (auto-execution indicator)
Update renderBoard() JavaScript to handle 'queued' status and render tasks in QUEUED column
Enable drag-and-drop support between TODO and QUEUED columns
Add branch name display to task detail modal (show when branch exists)
Add branch status badge to task detail modal (ahead/behind/conflicts indicator)
Add 'Create Conflict Resolution Task' button to task detail modal (visible when branchStatus is 'conflicts')
Implement createConflictTask() JavaScript function that calls POST /api/tasks/:id/conflict-task
Add baseBranch input field to task creation form (optional, defaults to 'main')
Test queue processing with multiple tasks of different priorities
Test branch creation and isolation for queued tasks
Test conflict detection and conflict resolution task creation
Update SPEC.md with Phase 11 Auto-Queue System documentation
Update README.md with queue feature usage instructions
